text: Letter dated 28 August 2018 from the President of the Security Council addressed to the Secretary-General

I have the honour to inform you that your letter dated 24 August 2018 (S/2018/789) concerning your recommendation to extend the mandate of the United Nations Regional Office for Central Africa for a period of three years, from 1 September 2018 to 31 August 2021, has been brought to the attention of the members of the Security Council. They take note of the information contained in your letter and the recommendation expressed therein.
